name: fconst6
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, c2), wcel(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, c2)
-| wcel(c1, c2)
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, c2)
-| wcel(c1, c2)
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c1, c2), wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wf(cxp(c0, csn(c1)), c0, c2)
-| wcel(c1, c2)

comment: A constant function as a mapping. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 30-Nov-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Apr-2015.)
